newsitem.title: GREECE: Athens bourse OKs Euromedica convertible/rights.
newsitem.headline: Athens bourse OKs Euromedica convertible/rights.

text.p: The Athens stock exchange cleared Euromedica's planned convertible bond issue which seeks to raise 552 million drachmas. The company was also given the green light for a 1.24 billion drachma rights issue.
Euromedica will issue 552,000 convertible bonds at 1,000 drachmas. The conversion price will also be 1,000 drachmas. The minimum trading lot will be 10 bonds.
It will also issue 1.656 million new common registered shares at 750 drachmas. The terms will be three new shares per 10 outstanding.
Proceeds will lighten short-term bank debt and a new diagnostic centre.
